name: adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold

details.description:
The adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold was created with a slip-on design.

This sneaker, in a black and white color scheme, features a "shell" design construction with a heel pull tab. It also has branding throughout, including adidas' serrated 3-Stripes detail and the Superstar box logo. On the tongue, there are golden details, too. Its elastane upper offers a snug fit, and the EVA outsole features deep flex grooves. The interior features an OrthoLite sock liner. The rubber outsole provides grip.

The adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold was released on February 1, 2022, at a retail price of $90.

name: adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold (GS)

details.description:
The adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold (GS) represents a timeless sneaker showcasing iconic features such as the distinctive, serrated three-stripes emblem, the renowned shell-style toe, and the iconic box logo, making it a true OG.

Crafted from sleek black leather, the adidas Superstar for grade school kids’ upper offers a sharp contrast against the cloud white and metallic gold accents. The iconic adidas serrated three stripes stand out prominently on the side in striking white. A metallic gold adidas brand graces the tongue tag, complemented by a Superstar wordmark on the quarter panel. Retaining its instantly recognizable shell toe, the sneaker features a traditional herringbone traction pattern on the rubber outsole. Inside, an OrthoLite sock liner enhances comfort.

We think the distinguishing characteristic of the adidas Superstar Core Black Cloud White Gold (GS) lies in its enduring iconic shell toe design that has persisted for over five decades. This design, coupled with the sneaker's distinctive color scheme, distinguishes it from other shoes in its category. The sneaker debuted for $80 on December 27, 2019.

name: adidas Superstar White Black

details.description: The adidas Superstar White Black is a classic sneaker that has been updated for modern times. This shoe features a white leather upper with black accents on the stripes and heel tab. The iconic shell toe is also present, giving the shoe its signature look. The original release date for this shoe was December 1st, 2019, and it retailed for $80. The materials used in the construction of this shoe are high-quality, ensuring durability and comfort. The adidas Superstar White Black is a versatile shoe that can be worn with a variety of outfits, making it a great addition to any sneaker collection.

name: adidas Superstar Vintage Bape White Black
adidas Superstar KoRn 30th Anniversary

details.description:
The adidas Superstar KoRn 30th Anniversary blends music and fashion in a design that celebrates the influential band's legacy. This collaboration merges adidas' iconic Superstar silhouette with elements that pay homage to American rock group KoRn's 30-year history.

The KoRn 30th Anniversary Superstar by adidas features a leather upper in white, black, and gold with embossed patterns inspired by the band’s aesthetic. The design incorporates the KoRn logo on the heel, the Adidas logo on the tongue, "Superstar" written in gold above the 3-Stripes that each say "Est. 1994". The classic shell-toe structure gives you extra durability, and the rubber outsole provides traction.

One aspect we, the experts, admire about the adidas Superstar KoRn 30th Anniversary is the intricate embossing, which adds depth to the leather upper. Another standout is the collaboration-specific branding, uniquely combining the brand's iconic elements with KoRn’s visual identity. Retailing at $140 when it was released on October 31, 2024, as a fitting tribute.

name: adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Chinese New Year

details.description:
The adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Chinese New Year is a lifestyle shoe featuring a Core Black jacquard silk upper, accented by adidas 3-Stripes branding in Carbon leather. The monochrome Core Black and Carbon color palette is emphasized by the 3D shell toe and serrated sole. Gold Metallic accents appear between the 3-Stripes and on the heel tab, coordinating with the tongue’s Trefoil logo and red gold coin lace tassel.

CLOT is a Hong Kong-based streetwear brand founded in 2003 by Edison Chen, known for celebrating individuality. adidas, the German footwear brand with a century-plus of heritage, collaborated with CLOT to create a limited-edition version of their Superstar sneaker in honor of the 2025 Lunar New Year celebration, which welcomed the year of the snake.

In our opinion, the best feature of the Superstar CLOT is its overstated sole and tongue, which create a bold statement. The adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Chinese New Year released on January 10, 2025, and retailed at $200.

name: adidas Superstar Wales Bonner White Croc
adidas adiFOM Superstar White Black

details.description:
The adidas adiFOM Superstar White Black comes in a Core White and Core Black color scheme.

The White Black adidas adiFOM Superstar has an upper that is crafted from leather material for durability. The shoe features adiFOM cushioning technology in the midsole, which offers responsive cushioning and impact absorption. In addition, the shoe features an outsole made of a rubber compound, providing stability and grip. The shoe displays the signature 3-Stripes branding on the lateral sides.

The standout feature of the adidas adiFOM Superstar in White Black is its iconic design that blends timeless style with modern comfort. The shoe's leather upper offers durability and a sleek look, while the rubber shell toe adds a classic touch. With its clean white and black colorway, the adidas adiFOM Superstar is a versatile and fashionable choice. The adidas adiFOM Superstar White Black was released on December 14th, 2022, and sold for a retail price of $110.

name: adidas adiFOM Superstar Black White

details.description:
The adidas adifOM Superstar Black White takes a classic sneaker silhouette and reimagines it. Created with sustainable materials and fused with a clog design, the resulting sneaker is a singularly eye-catching lifestyle shoe you can slip on and off with ease.

The adidas adifOM Superstar In a Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black colorway sports a subtly ridged black upper made of 100% foam rubber that has been sustainably derived from sugar cane. The shell closure takes on the look of a clog, but the contrasting white signature adidas 3-Stripes on the side panel grounds this shoe firmly in its iconic sneaker origins. The black sock liner matches the insole that provides another hit of contrast with its crisp white adidas branding. Black foam rubber makes another appearance as the cushioning material composing the midsole, which rests firmly on a black rubber outsole with a herringbone traction pattern.

The detail our sneaker experts appreciate the most about this lifestyle shoe is the white heel tab that melds the embossed trefoil branding into the undulating pattern of the upper. The adidas adifOM Superstar Black White was released on December 14, 2022 for an original retail price of $110.

name: adidas Superstar II White Black White
adidas Superstar 92 by Pharrell Black White
adidas Superstar II Triple White
adidas Superstar Vintage Bape Blue White
adidas Superstar AEC Sean Wotherspoon Superearth Black

details.description:
Sean Wotherspoon and adidas Originals revisit their first collaborative sneaker adidas Superstar Sean Wotherspoon Superearth black.

The adidas Superstar Sean Wotherspoon Superearth Black is solely made of recycled and vegan material. It features multi-colored embroidered flowers on the lateral side with hanging tassels of sky blue, purple, gold, white and orange over the midsole. At the base, adidas Superstar Swan Wotherspoon Superearth Black features black leather and black Three Stripes that can hardly be seen on the lateral side. The shoe also features decorative "S" patches of Super Earth which serve as lace accents.

Released on 22nd October 2021, adidas Superstar Sean Wotherspoon Superearth Black had a retail price of $110.

name: adidas Superstar All Black
adidas Superstar Song for the Mute Brown Black
adidas Y-3 Superstar Triple Black
adidas Superstar II Damian Lillard Dame Time
adidas Superstar Shelltoe Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

details.description:
The adidas Superstar Shelltoe Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is part of a line of sneakers that pay tribute to the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The nostalgic sneaker also celebrates the 40th anniversary of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles franchise.

What makes this sneaker stand out is the colorway inspired by the crime-fighting turtles: olive green, red, and black. The white toecap also features a turtle shell design. The upper is made of leather in olive green with the serrated 3-Stripes logo along the side panels in red. Each serrated stripe is outlined in dark green and ‘SHELLTOE’ in gold lettering runs along the 3-Stripes logo. The sneaker boasts subtle elements that celebrate the turtles, including a lace charm and ‘NINJA POWER’ inscribed under the tongue.

Our StockX experts like the turtle shell design on the tongue’s adidas logo tag. The adidas Superstar Shelltoe Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles was released on March 22nd, 2024, and retailed at $130.

name: adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Black

details.description:
The adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Black is part of the second drop brought to you by adidas and Edison Chen, a Hong Kong–based streetwear label founded by the actor of the same name.

Finding inspiration in Chen’s creative journey, the sneaker was first seen during Shanghai Fashion Week and is a mature take on the classic Superstar silhouette. The signature shell toe is crafted from premium leather with carefully stitched ridges. The upper is made of premium leather in Core Black, while Cloud White details are visible on the 3-striped logo and a line running through the midsole. In addition, the retro-inspired adidas logo tag on the tongue comes in Core White. The sneaker boasts tassels on the laces, which speaks to its premium aesthetic.

Our experts like the perforation details around the collar and between the 3-Stripes. The adidas Superstar CLOT By Edison Chen Black was first released on April 12, 2024, and sold for $200.
